channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Musical Ability Award?
channel.description: Just wanted everyone's opinion on this, I think it could be a cool badge idea. Prerequisites could include showing expertise in musical arts.

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Musical Ability Award?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

The ability would be too bias, as ability has to do with bias-ness.

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Musical Ability Award?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:


badge please

on a more serious note - there is no reason not to branch these forums off towards musical discussion. we dont need a badge for all aspects of the site, because it’s stupid. but the discussion could be incorporated with graphic section. just change it to multimedia? graphics/music/non-rs models, etc

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Musical Ability Award?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:59, topic:529116”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=647872.msg4359977#msg4359977 date=1378518954]
No support… in my opinion this is a stupid idea. I’m not even going to state why.
[/quote]
Well that’s not provocative in the least.

Everyone else: it would be better to have a music board first as opposed to a badge, I agree. I’ll edit my original post with that included.[/quote]
It wasn’t meant to be interpreted as a provocative statement, it was just meant to be blunt.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Musical Ability Award?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Nothing wrong with the idea if you were on the GameDev side of the website, because I’m pretty sure the point of all the badges and awards are supposed to represent contributions to the community. I could possibly see this working in the Sounds and Music section of GameDev. That side of the site is pretty dead, though.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Musical Ability Award?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Ideally this forum is about all those things. Without programming there would be no rsps. We need programmers to pass on knowledge to new members, so they can make the new generation servers etc.
“ideally”
she don’t really work this way though

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Musical Ability Award?
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

[quote=“4x4Chevrolet, post:8, topic:529116”]Personally I dislike this idea because: This isn’t a forum about music, in any way at all. In my opinion, all awards should be related to the topic of the forum. Like in this instance, anything relating to RSPS, helping people solve problems, writing tutorials, and knowing your stuff in general.

I know we already have awards such as C# guru and such, which have nothing to do with RSPS, but weren’t those carried over from MITB? A forum which had a bigger focus on general computer science, than this forum does at least. /end[/quote]

This forum also isn’t about minecraft, intellectual debates, programming, web development, or graphics. find a better argument

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Musical Ability Award?
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:47, topic:529116”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=647872.msg4358773#msg4358773 date=1378241242]

Badge for dance
Badge for best video ever
Badge for Most threads posted
Badge for Most posts posted
Badge for most athletic
badge for having 6 pack
best p0rn video badge
Badge for having the most badges
Don’t mind me, but I don’t like where this is headed. Website developer, graphicdesigner, modeller, tutorial author correlate to the sites core values which is acceptable. I don’t see anything wrong with our current badges. However maybe the Pokemon theme is off to me because maybe this isn’t a pokemon site but thats beside the point.

Do you realize the chaos this site would have if it wasn’t pokemon themed?
[/quote]
no[/quote]
well i do, thankfully. i’m sure Tom realizes it too.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED]Musical Ability Award?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I have only seen around 2/3 people who actually produce music on this website, and that number does not nearly justify an award for it. Also, taking Frell’s point, there is nobody who could judge it fairly on this forum. This is not the X Factor, and nobody here is Simon Cowell.

Read full topic
